Deloitte is where you’ll find unrivaled opportunities to succeed and realize your full potential.

 

The Team
 

Deloitte India has 4 business verticals - Technology & Transformation (T&T), Audit & Assurance (A&A), Tax, Strategy, Risk & Transactions (SR&T). Under T&T, we provide services around Enterprise Technology and Performance (ET&P), Engineering AI and Data, Cyber, Customer and Human Capital.

 

Finance Transformation (FT) is a leading practice under ET&P. Under FT, we solve complex challenges for CFOs across various domains – Finance Processes, Operating Model, Business Finance, Treasury, Controllership, GBS/GIC/SSC/CoE and Enterprise Performance Management.

 

Our treasury offering is aimed at supporting CFO and Business Leaders in managing market risks and supporting commercial decisions. Treasury Process Transformation – Modernizing and optimizing treasury operations through technology and best practices to enhance efficiency, risk management, and financial decision-making.

SALESFORCE MARKETING CLOUD LEAD


As a Salesforce Marketing Cloud (SFMC) LEAD, you will bring considerable technical and product expertise to deliver world-class SFMC-based solutions to clients. You will be part of a dynamic leadership team that will be responsible for driving SFMC technical solutions at client sites. The projects that you will lead would allow you the opportunity to work with some of the most in-demand and newest features of SFMC such as Data Cloud, Interaction Studio, Datorama, Audience Studio, etc.

           

Work You’ll Do

 

Understanding client business and technical requirements
Work alongside the wider team, lead the overall technology solution, planning and estimation for complex projects
Managing internal, client and partner stakeholders, including C-level executives
Mobilizing and managing engagement teams, and establishing the project structure and governance
Managing engagement economics, risk and day-to-day interactions with executive clients and sponsors

Conduct quality reviews of our implementation to ensure they meet our high standards
Act as a role model for the team by always demonstrating the highest standards in business, digital-led transformation
Drive innovation and continuous improvement in the design and delivery practices of our solutions, including Salesforce Marketing Cloud’s best practice in the implementation of client solutions.
Leading business development initiatives including selling to C-level executives and
Develop and maintain certifications and trainings with salesforce as new technologies and upgrades are released

Provide leadership and support for delivery teams and staff in local offices.

 

 

PREFERRED

 

Salesforce or SFMC certifications preferred
Understanding or exposure to SFMC components (i.e. Audience Studio, Datorama, Interaction Studio, etc.)
Experience with other marketing technologies and analytics tools (i.e. Adobe, Oracle, Sprinklr, Google, etc.)
Knowledge of Salesforce Sales Cloud, preferred but not required
Knowledge of Salesforce Data Cloud
Experience in leading SFMC implementations
Experience leading large teams (on- and off-shore) and technology engagements, including client and consulting staff
Strong communication skills (interactions with executive clients and sponsors)
Experience with selling to C-level executives and other business development activities

Four-Year Bachelor’s Degree
9+ years of relevant technology consulting or industry experience
Hands-on platform experience on Salesforce Marketing Cloud, and/or other SFMC ecosystem platforms (i.e. Audience Studio-DMP, Datorama, Interaction Studio, etc.)
Experience leading large full-lifecycle implementations and/or implementing integrated solutions including other SFMC ecosystem technologies, cloud-based marketing solutions, integration services and data modelling
Great communicator, capable of articulating and collaborating confidently with various departments
Experience in Agile/ Scrum will be a bonus point.
